input.sentences: a woman poses with her grandparents before the graduation .
she and her family all go out for dinner before the big event .
the audience is packed with people .
the young woman stands on stage proudly .
finally after graduation she poses with her friend in celebration .
output.sentences: Grandpa and Grandma traveled for their granddaughter.
Their daughter took them out to lunch.
Later they all went to the granddaughters graduation.
Her degree is in political science.
